content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Hello Mister Heine, thank you for inviting me to see the apartment. I understand that you are offering to rent it to me for €500 per month. This is a bit outside of my budget, but I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would you be open to discussing a lower rental price?
name: Mary Smith

content: I can accept that price, but only if you sign a 6-month lease. Otherwise, I can only offer a 3-month lease at €450 per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your terms, Mister Heine. I would be willing to sign a 6-month lease for €500 per month. This is a fair price for the size and location of the apartment. Thank you for your consideration.
name: Mary Smith

content:
I can agree to the 6-month lease at €500 per month. Please sign the lease agreement. Thank you.

[Heine signs the lease agreement and hands it to the tenant]
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I appreciate your willingness to work with me on the rental price and the lease term. I am happy to sign the lease agreement and move into the apartment. Thank you again for giving me the opportunity to rent your property.
name: Mary Smith
